MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm to make a repair to an underground cable fault at Allan Park and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:29am on 6th December 2020
